TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IgnoreSectionHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: 針對 型別所未處理的組態區段提供舊版區段處理常式定義。

span.span: Provides a legacy section-handler definition for configuration sections that are not handled by the types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態系統完全剖析組態檔，以收集設定資訊，並遇到沒有對應的項目中的組態區段時，會擲回例外狀況`configSections`> 一節。The configuration system completely parses configuration files to collect configuration information and throws exceptions when it encounters configuration sections that do not have a corresponding entry in the `configSections` section. 不會處理這些區段類型、 新的包裝函式類型提供。For those sections not handled by the types, the new wrapper type is provided. 這是為了避免剖析組態檔的例外狀況。This is to prevent configuration-file parsing exceptions. 舊版用途也會提供。For legacy purposes the is also provided.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: parent
param.span: 在對應的父代組態區段中的組態設定。

span.span: The configuration settings in a corresponding parent configuration section.

param.name: configContext
param.span: 組態區段處理常式用來計算組態值的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path for which the configuration section handler computes configuration values.

param.span: 通常這個參數會被保留，且為 。

span.span: Normally this parameter is reserved and is .

param.name: section

span.span: An that contains the configuration information to be handled.

param.span: 提供組態區段的 XML 內容的直接存取權。

span.span: Provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.

summary.span: 建立新的組態處理常式，並將指定的組態物件加入區段處理常式集合。

span.span: Creates a new configuration handler and adds the specified configuration object to the section-handler collection.

returns.span: 已建立的組態處理常式物件。
